FRANCE AND SWITZERLAND
14 NIGHT/13 DAYS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|26px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Oswald||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”87px” custom_margin=”-22px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVE IN PARIS

Arrival at Paris CDG airport. Pickup and transfer to hotel. Rest day free for leisure activities.

Overnight in Paris.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Oswald||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”127px” custom_margin=”0px|||||” custom_padding=”6px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: PARIS CITY TOUR AND VISIT TO EIFFEL TOWER

After breakfast, depart for Paris city tour on SIC basis with River Seine Cruise and Eiffel Tower 2nd level Ticket. Tour will finish at Eiffel Tower. Rest day free for leisure. Overnight stay. You will enjoy a pleasant city tour on a panoramic bus, a charming cruise on the Seine and an exceptional view from the top of the Eiffel Tower. You will leave for a complete Paris sightseeing tour. Boarding a panoramic bus city tour, you will discover the greatest neighborhoods and Paris landmarks: the Eiffel Tower, the Ile de la Cité and Notre-Dame de Paris, the Invalides, the Latin Quarter and many others. You will see the habits of Parisians and understand how they perceive their city. You will learn the history of Paris and the evolution of its architecture.

Note: Eiffel Tower – 2nd Level – Ticket (Subject to availability).

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Oswald||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”28px” custom_margin=”-2px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: VISIT TO LOUVRES MUSEUM

After breakfast today, you visit the Louvres museum and do the audio tour, must-see attraction and discover under-appreciated treasures in this comprehensive tour. Skip-the-Line access gives you more time to absorb all that the massive museum has to offer.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Oswald||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”127px” custom_margin=”-1px||18px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: TRANSFER TO AIRPORT

After breakfast check-out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight to Nice. On arrival in Nice transfer to hotel . The rest of the day is free to explore local surroundings.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”143px” custom_margin=”-22px||40px|||” custom_padding=”22px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: FULL DAY: MONACO & PERCHED MEDIEVAL VILLAGES

Discover the villages crowning the French Riviera and the Monaco the Mediterranean pearl. Disclose the exclusive Monaco’s secrets! Vanguards the most moderns Country city in the world, Monaco it’s today a place where traditions and innovation goes together. Gaining lands over the sea stands the amazing district of Old-Fountain. (Fontvieille). Go around and have a look: it is holding the Stadium Louis II site of the AS Monaco, the industry and manufacturing, residential and even more. The Old Town (Vieilleville) at the top of the Rock with the home’s Prince HM Albert II and their Royal Family House, the Cathedral, Gardens, views, shops restaurants and snacks. The masterpiece of Prince Carlo III: the District of Montecarlo where stands the principal Casino and the major buildings of the classical old fashion zone. Any corner every place, their historical monuments, the greatest challenges of modernity and many improvements to contemplate on the Principality. Picture contest so, just grab your camera, sunglasses and a backpack to challenge yourself and explore unlimited the medieval villages of the French Riviera. Eze mysteries, views, perched trees; it gives you the chance to find in Fragonard a great ancient perfume factory, chapters of history, ramparts had been transformed as a relax place in its special lights and panoramic views. Unique place, Eze holds itself at the seafront of the Mediterranean Sea. Subsequently, towards the hinterland to discover Grasse, St. Paul de Vence, Tourettes-sur- Loup and Gourdon, let’s go to the villages perched go through to conquer the depths of the mountains.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”74px” custom_margin=”-22px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 06: HOP ON HOP OFF TOUR

Zip between seaside sights in dreamy nice on an open-top double-decker bus. Cruise along the Baie des Anges on the famed Promenade des Anglais, listen to engaging commentary onboard, and jump off whenever you want to get a closer look at museums, neighborhoods, and landmarks. Step onto a comfortable double-decker bus and settle into a seat, listening to entertaining stories and historical facts about this cosmopolitan Côte d’Azur city. Ride the sun-soaked streets as you admire the opulent architecture of this fabled resort destination and the centuries-old buildings of the Vieilleville.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Oswald||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”205px” custom_margin=”-22px|||||” custom_padding=”33px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 07: FLIGHT TO ZURICH

After breakfast, check out from hotel. Transfer to Zurich Airport. Arrival, transfer and check-in at hotel.

Overnight in Zurich.

DAY 08: MOUNT TITLIS AND LUCERNE DAY TOUR FROM ZURICH

After breakfast, proceed to visit Mt. Titlis excursion on SIC basis. Experience Mount Titlis’ dramatic summit on a full-day excursion from Zurich. First, explore Old Town Lucerne on a short orientation drive through the city and then explore independently. Travel to Engelberg, a resort cradled by the Swiss Alps, and ascend to the summit of Mount Titlis for breathtaking Alpine vistas. Take a chairlift to get up close to frozen crevices, and cross Europe’s highest suspension bridge.

DAY 09: ZURICH CITY TOUR

After breakfast, enjoy Zurich city tour by Classic trolley. Experience the town on this unique city tour . The air-conditioned Panorama bus takes you on a 100-minute round trip to the sights of Switzerland’s largest city. The route leads across the famous Bahnhofstrasse and the banking center of the lake with a view of the snow-capped mountains, part of the old town with its magnificent guild houses and the churches St. Peter, Grossmünster and Fraumünster. You’ll see the university quarter and the residential area Zürichberg, the National Museum and the Kunsthaus. At the two most scenic viewpoints there will be  a short photo stop. Rest day free leisure / shopping activities on your own.

Overnight in Zurich.

DAY 10: ZURICH CITY TOUR 

After breakfast, enjoy Zurich city tour by Classic trolley. Experience the town on this unique city tour . The air-conditioned Panorama bus takes you on a 100-minute round trip to the sights of Switzerland’s largest city. The route leads across the famous Bahnhofstrasse and the banking center of the lake with a view of the snow-capped mountains, part of the old town with its magnificent guild houses and the churches St. Peter, Grossmünster and Fraumünster. You’ll see the university quarter and the residential area Zürichberg, the National Museum and the Kunsthaus. At the two most scenic viewpoints there will be  a short photo stop. Rest day free leisure / shopping activities on your own.

Overnight in Zurich.

DAY 11: LUCERNE AND TITLIS

After breakfast, use the swiss pass to go to Lucerne and then take 360 degree gondola to go up to the Titlis Mountain. Enjoy Mt. Titlis excursion. You can take optional Ice Flyer on your own at Mt. Titlis.  On the way back from Titlis do the cruise in Lake Lucerne. Take train from Lucerne to Interlaken.

DAY 12: MOUNT JUNGFRAUJOCH

After breakfast, take train to Mount Jungfraujoch. You can use your swiss pass.

Suggested- take funicular up the harder to an altitude of 1322 Meters to reach pavilion for spectacular views of Interlaken. Leisure time for Swiss shopping or stroll around in the city area.

Overnight in Interlaken. 

DAY 13: INTERLAKEN – ZURICH 

After breakfast, Check out from hotel. Take train to Zurich. Rest day free leisure /shopping activities on your own or you have the option to enjoy Zurich city tour by Classic trolley.

Overnight in Zurich.

DAY 14: DEPARTURE FROM ZURICH

After breakfast, check-out from hotel and transfer to airport for flight onwards.

Have a happy and safe trip!!
